definition[0]: relating to music or consisting of music
example[0]: a musical version of the fairy tale ‘Cinderella’
example[1]: When he began his musical career, King played only for black audiences.
definition[1]: good at or interested in playing or singing music
example[2]: She’s very musical and loves to sing.
definition[2]: having a pleasant sound like music
definition[3]: a play or film that includes singing and dancing
example[4]: Webber had three musicals playing in London at one time.
example[5]: Carroll appeared in a number of Broadway musicals.
